createProductTitle: Add your product to the marketplace
productPicsTitle: Show everyone here what you are offering
productDescTitle: Let's add more details on what this is going to be
postProductAccept: By clicking "Post product" button I accept
productPicsUploadDesc: Pictures will be shown in the order you are uploading them. The first picture will be the main picture of the post. To upload the picture, click on the preview button below. In order to delete picture that you do not want to be in the post, click on it once again.
onlyPngAllowed: Only PNG picture are allowed! The different formats will cause an error and you will not be able to upload them!
productWasModified: Product has been modified. Please, save your changes, otherwise, the progress will be lost.
youAreCompanyMemberTitle: Looks like you are a company member
postOnCompanyBehalfParagraph: Looks like you are the member of the {{ companyName }} company and you can post products on behalf of the company. Do you want to do that?
postOnCompanyBehalfConfirm: Yes, I want this product to be posted on behalf of the {{ companyName }} company.
postOnCompanyBehalfNotAllowed: Eh... It looks like you are not allowed to post products on behalf of your role. If you think that this is a mistake, contact your administrator and ask them to modify {{ roleName }} role.
